title: Woman Singer

adjectives: Indicating the most important performer or role
nouns: Person who sings, is able to sing, or earns a living by singing.
A singer; a person who likes to sing.
A person who sings, is able to sing, or earns a living by singing.
A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
A person who tries or whose job is to please, entertain or amuse.
A person who tries to please or amuse

description:
A woman singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone, and sometimes musical notes.

iOS and Android display this emoji as a Bowie-esque figure while WhatsApp appears heavily inspired by Prince.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman singer emoji is captured in a moment of passionate performance, often with a microphone held close and a subtle expression of vocalization. Apple‚Äôs glossy 3D shading gives her attire and the microphone a polished, vibrant appearance, while soft gradients and realistic lighting highlight her dynamic pose. This emoji embodies artistry, music, performance, and the joy of singing, frequently used when discussing concerts, karaoke, or musical talents.
